ComicInfo.Summary: Fight & Flight!: The Pitt beats up on a bunch of bikers and clothes himself. The police are investigating the subway crime scene where Pitt saved Timmy when three huge aliens show up looking for a fight.
ComicInfo.Title: Fight & Flight!
